name: Sub Shooter
description:
As Captain of a submarine advancing into unknown waters, you must take out as many enemies as possible in this fun and explosive, endless, top-down shooter to gain the highest score you can! How long will you survive?

This is my second game and was made as part of my GameDev.TV course journey and I had great fun playing with particle effects and choreographing the wave spawns. There is a more I would like to add to this game in the future, but for now I've published it for your enjoyment...hopefully!

I hope you have some good fun playing and exploding enemies!   :)

Note: This game looks a lot better quality when you download it to play. If anyone has any suggestions on increasing the web quality please let me know!

Key Controls

  • WASD / Arrow Keys - Move.
  • 'Space' - Shoot.
  • 'B' - Launch MOAB.
  • 'M' - Mute / Unmute Sound.
  • 'Q' - Return to the main menu.
  • 'ESC' - Quit application.

Play either in the browser or download the game to play on you PC.

All pixel art made by myself.

Sound effects obtained from zapsplat.com.

Font by Zacchary Dempsy-Plante obtained at https://www.dafont.com/pixellari.font.
